Interface IAuthController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthController
public interface IAuthController
Interface defining the contract for user authentication and account management.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • validateNRIC

      boolean validateNRIC(String nric)
      Validates an NRIC number.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC is valid, false otherwise

    • validatePassword

      boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a password against the system's password requirements.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets requirements, false otherwise

    • validateName

      boolean validateName(String name)
      Validates a user's name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to validate
      Returns:
      true if the name is valid, false otherwise

    • loginUser

      User loginUser(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on NRIC and password.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user attempting to log in
      password - The password for authentication
      Returns:
      The User object if authentication is successful, null otherwise

    • updateNewPassword

      boolean updateNewPassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being updated
      oldPassword - The current password for verification
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getAllApplicants

      List<Applicant> getAllApplicants()
      Retrieves all users of type Applicant.
      Returns:
      A list of all Applicant users in the system

    • getAllOfficers

      List<HDBOfficer> getAllOfficers()
      Retrieves all users of type HDBOfficer.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDBOfficer users in the system

    • getAllManagers

      List<HDBManager> getAllManagers()
      Retrieves all users of type HDBManager.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDBManager users in the system

    • addUser

      boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add to the system
      Returns:
      true if the user was added successfully, false otherwise

    • removeUser

      boolean removeUser(String nric)
      Removes a user from the system by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to remove
      Returns:
      true if the user was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • findUserByName

      User findUserByName(String name)
      Finds a user by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for
      Returns:
      The User object with a matching name, or null if no match is found

    • getUsers

      Map<String,User> getUsers()
      Gets the map of all users indexed by NRIC.
      Returns:
      The map of NRIC to User objects

    • setUsers

      void setUsers(Map<String,User> users)
      Sets the users map to a new map.
      Parameters:
      users - The new map of NRIC to User objects
